preface.title: About This Guide
preface.para: This guide helps cloud administrators in the execution of their daily tasks like managing projects and users, images, or flavors, setting quotas, or managing networks. Most of these tasks can either be achieved with the Web interface (the &productname; ‐) or the &ostack; command line tools.

Many chapters in this manual contain links to additional documentation resources. These include additional documentation that is available on the system as well as documentation available on the Internet.
